title: Login page throws 500 error on invalid credentials
description: When users enter incorrect username/password combination, the server returns a 500 internal server error instead of a proper authentication failure response. This prevents users from understanding what went wrong.

comments.author: Sarah Chen
comments.content: I've identified the root cause. The authentication service isn't properly handling the exception when credentials are invalid. Working on a fix now.

comments.author: Mike Johnson
comments.content: Thanks for the quick response! This is blocking our demo tomorrow, so really appreciate the priority.

title: Add dark mode support to dashboard
description: Users have requested a dark mode toggle for better usability during nighttime hours. This should be a system-wide theme that persists across sessions and applies to all UI components.

title: Database migration script fails on production
description: The migration script v2.1.3 fails when running against the production database due to foreign key constraints. Need to update the script to handle existing data properly.

comments.author: David Kim
comments.content: Fixed the constraint issues. The script now creates temporary tables to handle the data migration safely. Ready for review.

title: Implement automated testing pipeline
description: Set up CI/CD pipeline with automated unit tests, integration tests, and deployment to staging environment. Should trigger on every pull request and main branch commits.

title: User profile images not displaying correctly
description: Profile images appear pixelated and stretched on user cards. The image resizing logic needs to maintain aspect ratio and provide proper fallback for missing images.

title: Add export functionality for reports
description: Users need the ability to export project reports and issue lists to CSV and PDF formats. Should include filtering options and custom date ranges.

title: Performance optimization for large datasets
description: The issue list becomes slow when loading projects with 1000+ issues. Need to implement pagination, virtual scrolling, or other performance optimizations.

comments.author: Kevin Zhang
comments.content: Implemented virtual scrolling for the issue list. Testing shows 80% improvement in load times for large datasets. Still working on the search functionality optimization.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Users report they're not receiving email notifications for issue assignments and status changes. The email service integration needs investigation.

title: Mobile app dashboard redesign
description: Redesign the mobile dashboard layout to improve usability on smaller screens. Focus on better navigation, larger touch targets, and improved information hierarchy.

title: API rate limiting implementation
description: Implement rate limiting on public API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage. Should include configurable limits per user/API key and proper error responses.

comments.author: Ryan Murphy
comments.content: Rate limiting has been implemented using Redis. Set default limits to 1000 requests per hour per API key. Documentation updated with new headers and error codes.

title: Search functionality improvements
description: Enhanced search should support fuzzy matching, filters by date range, and search within comments. Users should be able to save and share search queries.

comments.author: Anna Thompson
comments.content: Implemented fuzzy search using Fuse.js and added date range filters. The saved searches feature is ready for testing. Can someone review the PR?

title: Security audit findings remediation
description: Address security vulnerabilities identified in the recent audit: XSS prevention, input validation, and secure session management. All findings marked as high or critical priority.

comments.author: Michael Brown
comments.content: Fixed 3 out of 5 critical vulnerabilities. Working on the XSS prevention in the comment system and session timeout implementation.
